projects.title: This Website
projects.description: This website is built with React, CSS, and Claude 3.5
highlights: Implemented smooth scroll animations using Framer Motion
Built custom React hooks for intersection observer and dark mode
Designed and implemented responsive glass-morphism UI

projects.title: Irish Rail Timetable
projects.description: A Raycast extension that allows you to search for Irish Rail live departure times
highlights: Developed a Raycast extension that allows users to search for Irish Rail live departure times
Utilized the Irish Rail API to fetch live data

projects.title: Movie Info Slack App
projects.description: A Slack app that allows users to search for movie information and get recommendations
highlights: Developed a Slack app using Java and Spring Boot that allows users to search for movie information and get recommendations
Utilized the TMDB API to fetch movie data and the OpenAI API to generate recommendations
